political_spectrums.name: Government Role
political_spectrums.left_description: Expanded government programs, stronger regulatory oversight.
political_spectrums.right_description: Reduce government programs, rely on market forces.

political_spectrums.name: Economic Policy
political_spectrums.left_description: Higher taxes on wealth, social welfare, market intervention.
political_spectrums.right_description: Lower taxes, minimal intervention, prioritize growth.

political_spectrums.name: Social Policy
political_spectrums.left_description: Expanding civil rights, inclusive social change.

political_spectrums.name: Foreign Policy
political_spectrums.left_description: Active participation in alliances, global leadership.
political_spectrums.right_description: Focus on domestic issues, avoid foreign entanglements.

political_spectrums.name: Federalism
political_spectrums.right_description: More authority to states and local governments.

political_spectrums.name: Civil Liberties vs Security
political_spectrums.left_description: Strong protections for individual rights, limited surveillance.

political_spectrums.name: Environmental Spectrum
political_spectrums.left_description: Aggressive emissions targets, strong environmental protections.
political_spectrums.right_description: Prioritize economic growth, minimize regulatory burdens.
